name: Securly
description:
Cloud-based web filtering for K-12 Schools | Parental controls for families | Manage screen time. Any device, anywhere.

Not only a pioneer, Securly is also one of fastest-growing EdTech companies in Silicon Valley. Maybe even the world. Our ground-breaking tech allows schools and parents to keep kids safe in what is an increasingly digital world. Our goal is not to censor the Internet, but to mitigate the negative effects it can have on children. To us, a safer world for kids is a goal worth having.

Our cloud-based web filter keeps students safe, parents in the loop, and school costs down. On top of this, we are paving the way with an AI that alerts parents and counselors to instances of cyberbullying or even self-harm. Our tech can literally save lives. Pretty cool, right? Not many tech companies can say that. 

From the coders to the engineers to the interns, everyone at Securly is motivated to make the Internet safer for millions of kids and, as a result, make them better digital citizens. That said, weâ€™re always on the lookout for like-minded people to help us expand our ranks. 

Securly was founded by two network security veterans with a combined 20+ years of security experience. We proudly serve over 1000 school districts and more than 2M students and staff throughout the world.

We have an important update regarding Securly's exciting leadership transition.[View the full statement](http://www.securly.com/</ceo-welcome>) regarding our new CEO, Tammy Wincup. 
# Keeping K-12 students safe, secure, and ready to learn
We empower school leaders with real-time information and the response tools required to save students' lives.
[Get a demo](http://www.securly.com/</request-a-demo>)
![Shield hero](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/home-shield-hero.webp)
Introducing ![Discern Logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/disecern-landing-page-logo.svg)
# AI-driven insights for K-12 school leaders
Empowering educators and staff with the data they need to help students thrive
[Find out more](http://www.securly.com/</discern>) [Request a demo](http://www.securly.com/</discern-demo>)

##  Solutions to support the whole student 
For students to engage in learning and reach their full potential, their safety and security needs must be met first. Keep your students safe, secure and ready to learn using technology tools designed specifically for K-12 schools.
[ **STUDENT SAFETY** ![Filter logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/filter-white-logo.svg) Add more value to your school's web filter spend ](http://www.securly.com/</filter>)
[ **STUDENT WELLNESS** ![Aware logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/aware-white-logo.svg) Comprehensive wellness monitoring for K-12 students ](http://www.securly.com/</aware>)
[ **CLASSROOM MANAGEMENT** ![Classroom logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/classroom-white-logo.svg) Classroom management that teachers love ](http://www.securly.com/</classroom>)
[ **AI DATA INSIGHTS** ![Discern logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/discern-home-logo.svg) Transform your students' online activity into insights ](http://www.securly.com/</discern>)
[ **CAMPUS SAFETY** ![Pass logo](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/pass-logo.svg) The #1 digital hall pass solution for K-12 schools ](http://www.securly.com/</pass>)
[View all products](http://www.securly.com/</solutions/all-solutions>)

## Why K-12 schools and districts love Securly
![Illustration of a Securly support executive looking at the monitor for identifying at-risk students](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/index-dedicated.webp)
**Dedicated to identifying at-risk students**
We provide school leaders with the knowledge and ability to efficiently support struggling students
![Illustration of a Securly personnel promising data privacy, holding a huge padlock](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/index-commited.webp)
**Committed to student data privacy**
Our solutions are built on enterprise-level data security and privacy practices to keep students safe
![Securly's implementation & support specialist showing a phone with a checkbox](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/index-support.webp)
**Experienced implementation and support**
Our world-class support teams successfully set up and maintain our customers' schools
![Illustration of Securly personnel with a measuring tape and shield badge](https://prod-web-assets-securly.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/images/index-tailored.webp)
**Tailored solutions for every school and district**
We design and customize our solutions to help match individual schools' goals and budgets 
_"Securly is fiercely dedicated to developing innovative student safety and wellness solutions that help our school leaders and educators keep students safe, secure, and ready to learn."_
**Tammy Wincup** _CEO_

Founded by two network security veterans, it has quickly become one of the fastest-growing companies in the sector, focusing on creating safer digital environments for K-12 schools and families. Over 1,000 school districts and more than 2 million students benefit from its platform. Securlyâ€™s innovative technology not only guards students against online dangers but also promotes their overall digital well-being. Its AI-driven systems can alert parents and counselors when a child might be experiencing cyberbullying or engaging in self-harm. In fact, Securly reports that its technology has saved over 2,000 student livesâ€”pretty remarkable for a tech company, donâ€™t you think?

The team at Securly, now numbering 51 members, is united by a passionate commitment to making the internet a safer space for kids. They offer a variety of solutions, including Aware for wellness monitoring, Classroom for classroom management, Filter for web filtering, and even Discern, an AI tool designed to enhance student support.

Having emerged from Y Combinatorâ€™s Batch IK12, Securly is not just an EdTech player; itâ€™s part of a vital conversation about student safety in this increasingly digital world.
